textAfterTable: 12 Songs Biography Born: 28 January 1966 in Krefeld, Germany Genre: German Pop Years Active: '90s, '00s, '10s Andrea Berg is one of the biggest-selling German pop divas of her generation, hitting number one with seven of her albums and winning four ECHO awards for her commercial prowess. Born January 28, 1966, in Krefeld, Berg was discovered in 1992 by producer/Svengali Eugen Römer, who ushered her into the studio within a week of signing. Her debut LP, Du Bist Frei, quickly followed, and while sales were poor, the follow-up, Gefühle, proved a massive hit, led by the smash single "Die Gefühle Haben Schweigepflicht."...
